sentences.english: It ' s the joint chief - of - staff , sir.
sentences.chinese: 是，參謀長聯席會議主席，先生。

sentences.english: to be responsible for the daily work of the retired officials' joint meetings.
sentences.chinese: 負責離退休幹部工作聯席會議的日常工作。

sentences.english: Participants of a joint military-civilian meeting shall be decided on by conveners of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 軍地聯席會議的參加人員由會議召集人確定。

sentences.english: The constitution was to go into effect when that joint session was convened.
sentences.chinese: 憲法將於該次聯席會議開會後生效。

sentences.english: To undertake day-to-day work of the Joint Inter-ministerial Meeting of the State Council for Marine Salvages ;
sentences.chinese: 承擔國務院海上搜救部際聯席會議的日常工作。

sentences.english: President Lee held a meeting with the Joint Chiefs of Staff in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 韓總統李在首爾舉行了參謀長聯席會議。
